thread.title: Busline League runners ready for championships Oct. 15
thread.title_full: Busline League runners ready for championships Oct. 15

author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Busline League runners ready for championships Oct. 15
text:
Busline League runners ready for championships Oct. 15 By Staff | Oct 14, 2015 Photo by: Ken Waltz 
Damariscotta â€” The Busline League middle school cross-country season has been off and running for weeks and individual and team championships will be on the line when the youngsters toe the start on Thursday, Oct. 15 at Great Salt Bay in Damariscotta. 
The first race (boys or girls) is at 3:45 p.m. and the second (boys or girls) at 4:30 p.m. 
The league includes teams from Troy Howard of Belfast, Searsport, Islesboro, Medomak of Waldoboro, Great Salt Bay of Damariscotta, Camden-Rockport, Appleton, Oceanside of Thomaston/Rockland, Boothbay and Lincolnville. 
There were 11 meets at 11 sites during the regular season. 
The following are photos from an Oct. 8 meet hosted by Lincolnville, that included Troy Howard, Searsport, Appleton, Islesboro and Camden-Rockport.
